Item.name: Dilapidated MTR65
Item.description: Modular Tactical Rifle 65. This Advanced Assault Rifle is covered is covered in rust and organic growths. You're shocked to see that it somehow still functions; Though its performance is horrible. Can be repaired via fabricator.

Item.name: MTR65 Mk.1 Mod 0
Item.description: Modular Tactical Rifle 65; Mark One, Version One. This Advanced Assault Rifle is Chambered in 6.5x39mm.

Item.name: Defunct MP58
Item.description: Modular Personal defense weapon 58. This weapon is covered in Organic Growths. You peer into the ejection port; Which is jammed open, and see tiny pieces of alien flora inside. This weapon is unusable. Can be restored via Fabricator.

Item.name: MP58 Mk.1 Mod 2
Item.description: Modular Personal defense weapon 58; Mark One, Version Three. This Old PDW is Chambered in 5.8x42mm. Cannot use 'Special' Ammo.

Item.name: MP58 Mk.1 Custom
Item.description: Modular Personal defense weapon 58; Mark One, Custom. This Old PDW is Chambered in 5.8x42mm. Most of the weapon has been modified. Accuracy Increased, ROF Increased, Capable of using 'Special' Ammo.

Item.name: MP58 Mk.2 Mod 1
Item.description: Modular Personal defense weapon 58; Mark Two, Version Two. This Advanced PDW is Chambered in 5.8x42mm Can feed from both Longitudinal and Box Magazines.

Item.name: XM10C
Item.description: Experimental Military 10 Compact. This Old, Experimental Carbine is Chambered in 6.5x39mm.

Item.name: Defunct M419 Mk.2
Item.description: Military 419; Mark Two. This Assault Rifle is covered in Strange Organic Growths and Rust. You attempt to operate the Charging Handle but the Latch doesn't budge. You notice strange vine like Growths coming out from the empty Magazine Well. This weapon is unusable. Can be repaired via Fabricator.

Item.name: M419 Mk.2 Mod 0
Item.description: Military 419; Mark Two, Version One. This Old Assault Rifle is Chambered in 6.5x39mm. This Weapon is highly outdated and functions poorly Underwater. Cannot use 'Special' Ammo.

Item.name: M419 Mk.2 Custom
Item.description: Military 419; Mark Two, Version One. This Old Assault Rifle is Chambered in 6.5x39mm. Most of the weapon has been modified. Accuracy Increase, ROF Increase, Capable of using 'Special' Ammo.

Item.name: M419 Mk.2 Custom (v2)
Item.description: Military 419; Mark Two, Version One. This Old Assault Rifle is Chambered in 6.5x39mm. The Receiver, Barrel and Muzzle have been further modified. Accuracy Increase, Recoil Decrease, Capable of using 'Special' Ammo.

Item.name: Defunct MBR419
Item.description: Military Battle Rifle 419. This Battle Rifle is covered in Rust and Organic Growths. There's a giant crack in the Stock going all the way up to the receiver; You can see the inside of the Magazine Well from it; You see nothing but Alien Flora.

Item.name: MBR419 Mk.1 Mod 0
Item.description: Military Battle Rifle 419; Mark One, Version One. This Old Battle Rifle is Chambered in 6.8x48mm. Cannot use 'Special' Ammo.

Item.name: MBR419 Mk.1 Custom
Item.description: Military Battle Rifle 419; Mark One, Version One. This Old Battle Rifle is Chambered in 6.8x48mm. Most of the weapon has been modified. Accuracy Increase, ROF Increase. Capable of using 'Special' Ammo.

Item.name: MBR419 Mk.1 Custom (v2)
Item.description: Military Battle Rifle 419; Mark One, Version One. This Old Battle Rifle is Chambered in 6.8x48mm. The Receiver, Barrel and Muzzle have been further modified. Accuracy Increase, Recoil Decrease. Capable of using 'Special' Ammo.

Item.name: Refitted Wasp 45
Item.description: This Wasp 45 SMG has been rebuilt using parts from a Standard Issue Europan Coalition SMG. Though it functions somewhat better than the EC SMG, it sounds like it's made entirely made of loose plastic and rattles violently when firing. Chambered in .45ACP. Cannot use 'Special' Ammo.

Item.name: Wasp 45 Mk.1 Mod 0
Item.description: Wasp 45; Mark One, Version One. This SMG is Chambered in .45ACP. Capable of feeding from any .45 Caliber Magazine.

Item.name: RCSR7
Item.description: Rapid Conversion Survival Revolver 7. This Unique Survival Revolver can be quickly and easily field converted to fire either .38s or Special 10mm Rounds.

Item.name: SD45
Item.description: Self Defense 45. A large yet Lightweight handgun designed for Civilians. It's Simple and Accessible design makes it a reliable Self Defense Option for people unskilled with weapons. This is not the best option for Offensive Operations. Chambered in .45ACP. Can only feed from a Pistol Magazine.

Item.name: SM45
Item.description: Saber Military 45. A Large yet Lightweight handgun designed primarily for Military Use. Capable of Automatic Fire. Capable of feeding from Pistol and Standard Magazines. Chambered in .45ACP.

Item.name: Viper47 Mk.2 Mod 1
Item.description: Viper 47; Mark 2, Version 2. This Advanced SMG is chambered in 4.7x38mm. Only feeds from Longitudinal Magazines.

Item.name: M419 Mk.4 Mod 0
Item.description: M419 Mark 4, Custom. This Advanced Assault Rifle is chambered in 4.7x38mm. Only feeds from Box Magazines.

Item.name: XaMTR86 Mod 1
Item.description: (Xa) Experimental Modular Tactical Rifle; Version Two. This Strange Assault Rifle is chambered in 8.6x48mm. An engraving of what appears to be an orange rabbit with a gasmask is etched onto the receiver.

Item.name: Defunct MSW58
Item.description: Modular Support Weapon 58. Alien Flora covers the body of this weapon. You've no idea how to operate this thing. You feel the sides of the weapon, attempting to find a way to open a feeding tray or something. You feel a part of the weapon compress. You push it and the front portion of the weapon rotates down, showing a hive of Alien Flora inside. You can repair this weapon via a Fabricator.

Item.name: MSW58 Mk.2 Mod 0
Item.description: Modular Support Weapon 58; Mark Two, Version One. This Support Weapon is Chambered in 5.8x42mm. Can feed from both Longitudinal and Box Magazines. Cannot use 'Special' Ammo.

Item.name: SPMG Mk.2 Mod 0
Item.description: Special Purpose Machine Gun; Mark Two, Version One. This Advanced Machine Gun is Chambered in 8.6x48mm. Can only feed from Drum Magazines.

Item.name: MAS12G Mk.1 Mod 0
Item.description: Modular Assault Shotgun; Mark One, Version One. This Unique Military Shotgun can be converted to use either 12 Gauge or 10 Gauge Shotgun shells. Requires a Fabricator for Conversion.

Item.name: MAS10G Mk.1 Mod 0
Item.description: Modular Assault Shotgun; Mark One, Version One. This Unique Military Shotgun can be converted to use either 12 Gauge or 10 Gauge Shotgun shells. It's heavy recoil makes it difficult to use without Intermediate Experience with Weapons. Requires a Fabricator for Conversion.

Item.name: MTR65 Mk.2 Mod 0
Item.description: Modular Tactical Rifle 65; Mark Two, Version One. This Advanced Assault Rifle is Chambered in 6.5x39mm. The complexity of this weapon makes it difficult to use without basic experience with weapons.

Item.name: MTR65 Mk.2 Mod 1 (SFS)
Item.description: Modular Tactical Rifle 65; Mark Two, Version Two, Sub-aquatic Fire Support Configuration. This Advanced Assault Rifle is Chambered in 6.5x39mm. The complexity of this weapon makes it difficult to use without basic experience with weapons.

Item.name: MTR65 Mk.2 Mod 1 (CQC)
Item.description: Modular Tactical Rifle 65; Mark Two, Version Two, CQC Conversion. This Advanced Assault Rifle is Chambered in 6.5x39mm. The complexity of this weapon makes it difficult to use without basic experience with weapons.

Item.name: MTR65 Mk.2 Mod 1 (MR)
Item.description: Modular Tactical Rifle 65; Mark Two, Version Two, Marksman Rifle Conversion. This Advanced Assault Rifle is Chambered in 6.5x39mm. The complexity of this weapon makes it difficult to use without basic experience with weapons.

Item.name: MTR-H68 Mk.2 Mod 0
Item.description: Modular Tactical Rifle-Heavy 68; Mark Two, Version One. This Advanced Assault Rifle is Chambered in 6.8x48mm. The complexity of this weapon makes it difficult to use without extensive experience with weapons.

Item.name: MTR-H68 Mk.2 Mod 1 (SFS)
Item.description: Modular Tactical Rifle-Heavy 68, Sub-aquatic Fire Support Configuration; Mark Two, Version Two. This Advanced Assault Rifle is Chambered in 6.8x48mm. The complexity of this weapon makes it difficult to use without extensive experience with weapons.

Item.name: MTR-H68 Mk.2 Mod 1 (CQC)
Item.description: Modular Tactical Rifle-Heavy 68; Mark Two, Version Two, CQC Conversion. This Advanced Assault Rifle is Chambered in 6.8x48mm. The complexity of this weapon makes it difficult to use without extensive experience with weapons.

Item.name: MTR-H68 Mk.2 Mod 1 (MR)
Item.description: Modular Tactical Rifle-Heavy 68; Mark Two, Version Two, Marksman Rifle Configuration. This Advanced Assault Rifle is Chambered in 6.8x48mm. The complexity of this weapon makes it difficult to use without extensive experience with weapons.

Item.name: M419 Mk.4 Mod 1 (CQC)
Item.description: M419 Mark 4, Version 2; CQC Configuration. This Advanced Assault Rifle is chambered in 4.7x38mm. Only feeds from Box Magazines.

Item.name: MC419 Mk.4 Mod 0
Item.description: MC419 Mark 4, Version 1. This Advanced Compact Assault Rifle is chambered in 4.7x38mm. Only feeds from Box Magazines.

Item.name: M419 Mk.4 Mod 1 (MR)
Item.description: M419 Mark 4, Version 2; Marksman Rifle Configuration. This Advanced Assault Rifle is chambered in 4.7x38mm. Only feeds from Box Magazines.

Item.name: R-419 SOAR
Item.description: R-419 Special Operations Assault Rifle. This Strange Assault Rifle is chambered in 4.7x38mm. Only feeds from Box Magazines. You tilt the weapon to the left and inspect it. You read several labels, one appears to be the name of the weapon's Manufacturer; 'Lastimosa Armory'. You don't recognize the name.

Item.name: Jovian Carbine
Item.description: This Compact Jerry-built Autoloading Rifle is made of parts belonging to multiple weapons. Its design is simple and can be effectivey used by anyone with a little bit of understanding with weapons. It's primarily used by Jovian Separatist Terrorists that're unable to acquire proper weapons. Chambered in 4.7x38mm. Can only feed from Box Magazines. Cannot use 'Special' ammo.

Item.name: SPMG Mk.3 Mod 0
Item.description: Special Purpose Machine Gun; Mark Three, Version One. This Advanced Machine Gun is Chambered in 8.6x48mm. The sheer size and power of this weapon makes it difficult to use without extensive experience with weapons. Can feed from both Drum and Standard Box Magazines. Cannont use Phaethon Housing Munitions.

Item.name: SPMG Mk.3 Mod 1
Item.description: Special Purpose Machine Gun; Mark Three, Version Two. This Advanced Machine Gun is Chambered in 8.6x48mm. The sheer size and power of this weapon makes it difficult to use without extensive experience with weapons. This SPMG Configuration is Version 2. The barrel has been rebuilt using Physicorium and the Body Shroud has been redesigned with Heat-resistant Aluminium Alloy; Accuracy Increase, ROF Increase. Can feed from both Drum and Standard Box Magazines. Cannont use Phaethon Housing Munitions.

Item.name: SPMG Mk.3 Mod 2
Item.description: Special Purpose Machine Gun; Mark Three, Version Two. This Advanced Machine Gun is Chambered in 8.6x48mm. The sheer size and power of this weapon makes it difficult to use without extensive experience with weapons. This SPMG Configuration is a continuation of Version 2. A luminescent gun sight makes it much easier to aim; Accuracy Increase. Can feed from both Drum and Standard Box Magazines. Cannont use Phaethon Housing Munitions.

Item.name: XaSPMG Mod 1
Item.description: (Xa) Experimental Special Purpose Machine Gun; Version One. This Advanced Machine Gun is Chambered in 8.6x48mm. The sheer size and power of this weapon makes it difficult to use without extensive experience with weapons. Can feed from both PHM Drum and PHM Box Magazines. Can only use Phaethon Housing Munitions

Item.name: Modified Harpoon Gun
Item.description: A Heavily Modified Harpoon gun. The weapon is reinforced with Titanium Aluminium Alloy, allowing it to carry and fire Heavy Duty Harpoons. It also comes with a Top Mounted Laser Sight for Precision shooting underwater. Capable of Automatic Fire.

Item.name: Compact Spear Gun
Item.description: A Heavily Modified Harpoon gun which has been converted into a Compact Spear gun. This weapon is designed to be attached to the bottom of Rifles. It's too small to fit a Harpoon. Can only contain and fire a Single Spear.

Item.name: Refitted MAS12G
Item.description: This MAS12 has been rebuilt using parts from a Standard Issue Europan Coalition Riot Shotgun. Both the Tubular Magazine and Barrel are slightly longer than the regular Riot Shotgun. It's strange and clunky design makes it harder to load. The weapon is very heavy and smells like a block of lead. You feel like you're holding something that belongs on the inside of a toilet tank. Can only use Standard 12 Gauge Buckshot Shotgun Shells. Cannot use 'Special' Ammo.

Item.name: MAS6 Mk.1 Custom
Item.description: This Heavily Modified MAS12 is designed to load and fire a whopping 23x75mm Cartridge. The sheer power of this weapon makes it difficult to use without extensive experience with weapons. Famous among Europan Riot Security Officers wanting to prove something, this 'MAS6' is used to knock down Heavily Armored targets from a safe distance.

Item.name: Dilapidated M419 Mk.4
Item.description: M419 Mk.4. This Advanced Assault Rifle is covered is covered in organic growths. You're shocked to see that it somehow still functions, despite a giant piece of Organic Fiber growing out of the Magazine Well. You'll have to manually load cartridges into the weapon. Can be repaired via fabricator.

Item.name: Defunct SPMG
Item.description: Special Purpose Machine Gun. This SPMG is covered in Rust and Organic Growths. The Bottom half of the barrel shroud and the barrel itself is missing. Some form of Sea Yeast Shroom grows out of the receiver.

Item.name: 10 Gauge Shotgun Shell (Buckshot, Short)
Item.description: A 10 Gauge Buckshot Shotgun Shell. This particular Shell is slightly shorter; Only containing 12 Lead Pellets instead of the standard 18.

Item.name: 10 Gauge Shotgun Shell (Buckshot)
Item.description: A 10 Gauge Buckshot Shotgun Shell. Contains 18 Lead Pellets.

Item.name: 23x75mm Cartridge (Rifled SLKE)
Item.description: 23x75mm Cartridge; Rifled-Super Lethal Kinetic Energy shotgun slug. Designed to quickly Kill or Knock down Heavily Armored Targets at close range by destroying Internal Organs and Fragmenting Bones.

Item.name: 23x75mm Cartridge (Shredder-16)
Item.description: 23x75mm Cartridge; Shredder-16 shredshot shotgun shell. Designed to quickly Kill or Knock out groups of soft targets at close range by causing Instantaneous Hemorrhagic Shock and Dismemberment.

Item.name: AP Fin Stabilized Harpoon
Item.description: A Heavy, Armor Piercing Harpoon with Stabilizing Fins. It's too heavy to use on a Standard Harpoon gun.

Item.name: Fin Stabilized Harpoon
Item.description: A Harpoon with Stabilizing Fins.

Item.name: AP Fin Stabilized Spear
Item.description: A Heavy, Armor Piercing Spear with Stabilizing Fins.

Item.name: Fin Stabilized Spear
Item.description: A Spear with Stabilizing Fins.
